name: Doodle Invaders Beta
description:
Welcome to the closed beta of Doodle Invaders.

Only two types of level are available:

  • Asteroid Field where you dodge asteroids
  • Phalanx Level where you fight a group of Invaders

All graphics and audio are place-holders.

Debug keys:

  • n - Activate Negativland
  • p - Activate Speed Boost
  • delete - Kill player
Version History 0.1.5 (2021-12-20)
  • Upgraded to Godot 3.4
  • FIX: Chunky and Negativland effects end when the player dies
  • FIX: Dyslexic font had some wrapping issues
  • TWEAK: Volume controls range from 0 to -40 (was -60)
  • TWEAK: Anvil animation improved
  • FIX: Specials spawn on a higher layer so they aren't hidden by Asteroids
  • TWEAK: Lots of balancing changes
  • NEW: Speed Boost special in Asteroid levels
  • NEW: Chapter 1 "story" and animation
  • NOTE: It just restarts at the beginning when you get to the end at the moment
0.1.4 (2021-06-10)
  • MISC: Upgraded to Godot 3.3.2
  • NEW: Added Music Volume control to Settings
  • TWEAK: Dropper Shots are now played at different pitches and are launched on a pulse timer
  • TWEAK: Dropper loading/firing timing was rejiggered
  • NEW: Droppers sometimes spawn Specials when destroyed
  • NEW: Tank and Scout now have shot sounds

0.1.3 (2021-05-03)

  • TWEAK: Unimplemented Specials are faded out on Main Menu
  • NEW: Asteroids are destructible, but can take a lot of damage
  • TWEAK: Asteroid mass scales up with size
  • NEW: Phalanx game mode
  • TWEAK: Cannon shot has more mass
0.1.2
  • FIX: Asteroids sometimes flickered when spawning
  • FIX: Music wasn't playing after the first time you played the game
  • FIX: "Powerups" are called "Specials"
  • TWEAK: "Injured" music kicks in at 45% health rather than 75%
